mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART(ID, CART_QUANTITY, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID) VALUES(SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{quantity}, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBC.ID, TBM.MEMBER_ID , CART_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME AS 상품 이름, PRODUCT_PRICE AS 상품 가격, PRODUCT_PURCHASE_TYPE AS 상품 구매 타입 FROM TBL_CART TBC JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBP.ID = TBC.PRODUCT_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBM.ID = TBC.MEMBER_ID WHERE TBM.ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY TBC.ID DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_CART WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
